understanding.C: Create a PR branch that adds an inbox file codex/inbox/apply_hello_dev_<ts>.json pointing at infra/k8s/overlays/dev/hello-ksvc.yaml to trigger the S5 apply path. The runner should pick it up and produce reports/codex_runs/<id>/{apply.log,after.yaml,run.log}, showing the diff/apply/get sequence.

acceptance: A PR branch is created that includes codex/inbox/apply_hello_dev_<ts>.json with scope.path set to infra/k8s/overlays/dev/hello-ksvc.yaml. After the runner executes, the repository shows reports/codex_runs/<id>/apply.log, reports/codex_runs/<id>/after.yaml, and reports/codex_runs/<id>/run.log, and the logs indicate the S5 diff/apply/get sequence was attempted.
